attributes.action: High street shops should inform consumers of Pig Skinned shoes, in the fabric list!
attributes.additional_details:
Recently, we have come across the fact that most High street shops have shoes made out of pig skin, but do not reveal it!

I believe we should know exactly what we are wearing, especially if we are spending our own money on these shoes!

It also conflicts with people's religious beliefs as pig is prohibited in all shapes and forms; which is complete inconsideration on behalf of the Companies side, as they should clearly state exactly what material everything has been made of.

If clothes and other things state what fabric they have been made of, why is it so difficult to state what shoes have been made of?

We should demand they write out clearly what material has been used for shoes!

Sign this, and get your voice heard, and know exactly what you are wearing!
